meanings.definition: The act or process of writing plays.
meanings.sent1: Her playwritings were filled with humor and emotion.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy studying the art of playwritings.
meanings.sent3: The class erupted in laughter at her playwritings during the school play.
meanings.sent4: His playwritings painted vivid pictures in the minds of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The playwritings of Shakespeare are timeless classics.

meanings.definition: The written text of a play.
meanings.sent1: The playwritings were beautifully written and captivating.
meanings.sent2: The actors rehearsed the playwritings diligently.
meanings.sent3: She carefully studied the playwritings to prepare for her role.
meanings.sent4: The playwritings came to life on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The playwritings were printed in a small, elegant font.

meanings.definition: The profession or occupation of writing plays.
meanings.sent1: His dream was to pursue playwritings as a career.
meanings.sent2: Many famous playwrights have excelled in the field of playwritings.
meanings.sent3: She decided to dedicate her life to playwritings after seeing a Broadway show.
meanings.sent4: The world of playwritings is competitive but rewarding.
meanings.sent5: He found success and fulfillment in the world of playwritings.
